data.prayer: Spirit, guide the 133,516 believers in the county of Baynnur into all truth as they interpret Scriptures.
data.verse: For the word of God is alive and active. Sharper than any double-edged sword, it penetrates even to dividing soul and spirit, joints and marrow;

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Baynnur, Nei Mongol, China
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the county of Baynnur
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the county of Baynnur, Nei Mongol, China that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the county of Baynnur, Nei Mongol, China.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Saman people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Baynnur, Nei Mongol, China a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the county of Baynnur do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the children in the county of Baynnur to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.

location.name: Baynnur
location.people_groups_list: Han Chinese, Jin, Yakut, Mongol, Khamnigan, Yugur, Saragh, Evenki
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Han Chinese, Jin (63,890,000), Yakut (2,900), Mongol, Khamnigan (2,600), Yugur, Saragh (13,000), Evenki (35,000)
